text: sillo hananimkkeseoneun “hananim-eun gananhamyeo ulineun buyuhanola.” lago malhaneun jadeul-ui mal-eul imi deul-eusyeossnola. na(hananim)neun geudeul-i han malgwa geudeul-i budanghi seonjijadeul-eul salhaehan geos-eul giloghal geos-imyeo na(hananim)neun malhal geos-ini “neohuideul-eun taoleuneun beol-eul masbola.”
